analyzed: rga shi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /

translated: “If, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they are devoted to and fixated on the perfection of giving, and bless it,

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /

original: de ni / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol /

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /

analyzed: de mngon par shes pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /

original: mngon par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
translated: they practice the superknowledges.

original: de ni / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol /

translated: I say that they will not be freed from birth, aging, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, unhappiness, and distress.

analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //

analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /

translated: I say that they will not be freed from great suffering.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /

translated: I say that they will not be freed from great suffering.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /
translated: “If, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they are devoted to and form concepts about the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and bless them,

original: de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
analyzed: de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
translated: then, because they are devoted to and form concepts about the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and bless them,

original: @185a *// so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /

translated: they practice the detailed and thorough knowledges as something to be produced.

original: de ni / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang; yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol /

original: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
translated: and that they will not be freed from great suffering.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /
translated: “If, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they are resolved and have the notion that great compassion is something that is blessed,

original: de snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
analyzed: de snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
translated: then, because they are resolved and have the notion that great compassion is something that is blessed,

original: snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
translated: they will engage in the performance of great compassion.

original: de ni; skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol /

translated: It is said that they will not be liberated from birth, aging, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and distress,

original: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
translated: and that they will not be liberated from great suffering.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na /

translated: If, when a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom, he is attracted to and conceives of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha and blesses them,

original: de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
analyzed: de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas /
translated: then, because he is attracted to and conceives of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha and blesses them,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de /
translated: he practices to actualize the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: de ni / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa @185b las yongs su mi 'grol /

translated: I say that he will not be freed from birth, aging, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, depression, and distress,

original: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
translated: and he will not be freed from great suffering.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: a bodhisattva great being

original: nyan thos kyi sa'ang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'ang /

analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //

translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

translated: They do not engage with the notion that the element of the mind is not a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the element of the mind is peace.

analyzed: ma rig pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: ma rig pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / ma rig pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is not peace.🔽They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is empty.

analyzed: ma rig pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / ma rig pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is with signs.

translated: They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is signless.🔽They do not engage with the idea that ignorance is having aspirations.

analyzed: ma rig pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / ma rig pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: ma rig pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du byed la mi spyod de /

original: 'du byed bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: 'du byed bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: 'du byed ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / 'du byed stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: 'du byed mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: 'du byed mtshan ma med @198b ces bya bar mi spyod / 'du byed smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that compounded phenomena are not wished for.🔽They do not engage with the notion that compounded phenomena are calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that compounded phenomena are not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is not a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is imbued with happiness.🔽They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is imbued with suffering.🔽They do not engage with the notion that consciousness is a self.

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice with the idea that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is void.🔽They should not practice with the idea that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is calm.

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is calm, and they should not engage with the notion that it is not calm.

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is permanent.

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is not a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is afflicted.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is purified.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is empty.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is not empty.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance has signs.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽@203a *// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / @203a *// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of perseverance in terms of its having attributes.🔽They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of perseverance in terms of its being something that has aspirations.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of perseverance in terms of its being something that lacks aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of perseverance in terms of its being void.🔽They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of perseverance in terms of its being non-void.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration in terms of its having attributes.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
translated: They do not engage with the attributes of the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration in terms of its permanence.🔽They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration in terms of its impermanence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod; bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration in terms of its being imbued with happiness.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is suffering.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is a self.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is not a self.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is void.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is not void.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is afflicted.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is purified.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is calm.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is not calm.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is empty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is not empty.🔽They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is with signs.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is signless.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa @203b yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa @203b yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice in a way that is based on the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is having aspirations.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is empty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is empty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is not empty.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is with signs.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is signless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is with aspirations.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is without aspirations.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is not void.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is afflicted.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is purified.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is calm.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is not calm.’🔽They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is empty.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is not empty.’🔽They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom has a defining mark.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is without a defining mark.’🔽They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom has aspirations.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is without aspirations.’🔽They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is isolated.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang //// @204a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang //// @204a *//
translated: They should not practice while thinking, ‘The perfection of wisdom is not isolated.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
translated: Thirty-sixth section

original: nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with inner emptiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the causal signs of inner emptiness,🔽they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is permanent,

original: nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is impermanent,

original: nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is happiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is suffering,🔽they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is a self,

original: nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is not a self,🔽they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is peace,

original: nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is not peace,🔽they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is empty,

original: nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: they do not engage with the notion that inner emptiness is not empty,

original: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is with signs.

original: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is signless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is having aspirations.

original: nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is lacking aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is isolated.

original: nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is not isolated.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with external emptiness as a sign.🔽They do not engage with the notion that external emptiness is permanent.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that external emptiness is impermanent.

original: phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that external emptiness is happiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that external emptiness is suffering.

original: phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that external emptiness is a self.

original: phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces @204b bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces @204b bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is a self,🔽or that it is not a self.

original: phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / phyi stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is calm,🔽or that it is not calm.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is empty,🔽or that it is not empty.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is signless,🔽or that it is not signless.

original: phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is wishless,🔽or that it is not wishless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external phenomena is void,🔽or that it is not void.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external and internal phenomena is a self,🔽or that it is not a self.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of external and internal phenomena is calm,🔽or that it is not calm.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is permanent.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is impermanent.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is imbued with happiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is imbued with suffering.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is a self.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is not a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is peace.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is not peace.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is empty.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is with signs.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of the external is signless.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena in terms of ‘aspirations.’🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena in terms of ‘no aspirations.’

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena in terms of ‘seclusion.’

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa @205a *//
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa @205a *//
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of external and internal phenomena in terms of ‘no seclusion.’

original: dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
analyzed: dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the attributes of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of emptiness in terms of ‘permanence.’

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of emptiness in terms of ‘impermanence.’

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of emptiness in terms of ‘happiness.’

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is with signs.

translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is with signs.

translated: They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is having aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is lacking aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the great emptiness is void.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is with signs.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is signless.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is with aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is without aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not calm.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is void.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is afflicted.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is purified.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is arising.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is ceasing.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as having signs.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as signless.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as having aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as lacking aspirations.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as calm.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as not calm.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence as having signs.🔽They do not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence as having aspirations.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /

translated: They do not engage with the emptiness of inherent existence as arising.🔽They do not engage

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /

translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the applications of mindfulness are signless.

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the applications of mindfulness are with wishes.🔽They do not engage in union with the thought that the applications of mindfulness are without wishes.🔽They do not engage in union with the thought that the applications of mindfulness are isolated.

analyzed: @211b dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the applications of mindfulness are not isolated.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the right efforts are a sign.🔽They do not engage in union with the thought that the right efforts are permanent.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod / yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the right efforts are impermanent.🔽They do not engage in union with the thought that the right efforts are happiness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage in union with the thought that the right efforts are suffering.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are imbued with happiness.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are imbued with suffering.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are a self.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod; yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod; yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are not a self.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are empty.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are not empty.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are with signs.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are signless.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are having aspirations.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are lacking aspirations.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the bases of supernatural power are calm.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are with attachment, or that they are without attachment.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are the supports for miraculous abilities.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are pure, or that they are impure.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are entities, or that they are non-entities.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are calm, or that they are not calm.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag @212a *//🔽ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag @212a *// ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are void, or that they are not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are afflicted, or that they are purified.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are arising, or that they are perishable.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous abilities are entities, or that they are non-entities.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are entities, or that they are non-entities.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are calm, or that they are not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are void, or that they are not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the faculties are afflicted, or that they are purified.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /

translated: They do not engage with the notion that the powers of the tathāgatas are compounded.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the powers of the tathāgat

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are calm.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are empty.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are not empty.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are with signs.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are signless.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are with aspirations.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are without aspirations.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are isolated.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod; mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod; mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses are not isolated.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: “They should not engage with the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are a self.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not a self.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They should not engage with the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty.🔽They should not engage with the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not empty.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod; so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod; so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of happiness or suffering.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag @219b med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag @219b med ces bya bar mi spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of self or not self.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of being calm or not calm.🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of being empty or not empty.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of being with signs or signless.🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of being with wishes or wishless.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges in terms of being entities or nonentities.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are empty.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are not empty.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are with signs.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are signless.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are with wishes.’

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de /🔽snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /🔽snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de / snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are wishless.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are compounded.’

original: snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are uncompounded.’

original: snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are calm.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are not calm.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are void.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are not void.’

original: snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod / snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are afflicted.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are purified.’

original: snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are produced.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are stopped.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are entities.’🔽They do not engage with the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking, ‘The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-entities.’

original: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is empty.

original: snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽snying rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod / snying rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is not empty.🔽They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is with signs.🔽They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is signless.

original: snying rje chen po smon pa @220a *//🔽yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po smon pa @220a *// yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is with aspirations.

original: snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is without aspirations.

original: snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is isolated.🔽They do not engage with the notion that great compassion is not isolated.

original: snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are with signs.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are without signs.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are permanent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are permanent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are imbued with happiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are imbued with suffering.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are a self.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not a self.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not void.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are afflicted.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are purified.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of their being entities or non-entities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽sangs @220b rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod / sangs @220b rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of their being with signs or signless.🔽They do not engage with the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of their being with aspirations or aspirationless.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of their being isolated or not isolated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o ////
translated: When they do not engage in that way, it should be known that bodhisattva great beings are skilled in means.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa; bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa; bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: why is that?

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of form is not form.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no form.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med; gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzugs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med; gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs /
translated: Apart from form there is no emptiness.🔽Form is emptiness.

original: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is form.

original: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
analyzed: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med /
translated: The emptiness of feeling is not feeling.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no feeling.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba /
translated: Apart from feeling there is no emptiness.🔽Feeling is emptiness.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is feeling.🔽The emptiness of perception is not perception.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no perception.

original: 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du shes med /
analyzed: 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes ma yin; stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du shes med /
translated: Apart from perception there is no emptiness.🔽Perception is emptiness.🔽Emptiness is perception.🔽The emptiness of volitional factors is not volitional factors.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no volitional factors.

original: 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes /
analyzed: 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes /
translated: Apart from volitional factors there is no emptiness.🔽Volitional factors are emptiness.

original: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is volitional factors.

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of volitional factors is not the volitional factors.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there are no volitional factors.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed /
translated: Apart from volitional factors there is no emptiness.

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid @221a *//
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid @221a *//
translated: Volitional factors are emptiness and emptiness is volitional factors.

original: do; ;rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: do; ;rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med /
translated: The emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa /
translated: Apart from consciousness there is no emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Consciousness is emptiness and emptiness is consciousness.

original: mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig med /
analyzed: mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig med /
translated: The emptiness of the eyes is not the eyes.🔽Apart from emptiness there are no eyes.

original: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mig /
analyzed: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang mig /
translated: Apart from the eyes there is no emptiness.

original: mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the eyes and the eyes are emptiness.

original: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba med /
analyzed: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba med /
translated: The emptiness of the ear is not the ear.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no ear.

original: rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rna ba /
analyzed: rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang rna ba /
translated: Apart from the ear there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the ear.

original: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The ear itself is emptiness.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna med /
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna med /
translated: The emptiness of the nose is not the nose.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no nose.

original: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sna /
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang sna /
translated: Apart from the nose there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the nose.

original: sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nose itself is emptiness.

original: lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce med /
analyzed: lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce ma yin / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce med /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue.🔽Apart from emptiness there is no tongue.

original: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang lce /
analyzed: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang lce /
translated: Apart from the tongue there is no emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the tongue.

original: lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin /
analyzed: lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin /
translated: The tongue itself is emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the body is not the body.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus med /
translated: Apart from emptiness there is no body.

original: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus /
translated: Form is not other than emptiness.

original: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las @221b gud na'ang yid med /
analyzed: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin / stong pa nyid las @221b gud na'ang yid med /
translated: The emptiness of the mind is not the mind.🔽The mind is not other than emptiness.

original: yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang yid /
analyzed: yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid kyang yid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the mind.

original: yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do // gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin /
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med /
translated: Form is not other than emptiness.
